name: Mahmood Alshahahdi
title: Industrial Engineer / Data Analyst
summary: Dynamic and resourceful professional with a background in Industrial Engineering. Specialized in process optimization, data-driven decision-making, and efficiency innovation. Currently targeting Process/Data Analyst roles with expertise in SQL, Python/R, and advanced KPI dashboarding.

education.details: Focused on Lean Management and German Business Culture.

experience.description: Leading data initiatives for eBike telemetry and internal dashboarding systems.
achievements: Developed a Telemetry Data Visualization Dashboard using Python and Streamlit.
Optimized data pipelines reducing latency by 40%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define key performance metrics.

experience.description: Analyzed warehouse throughput and logistics bottleneck removal.
achievements: Identified 15% efficiency gain in sorting lines.
Created dynamic Excel tools for daily volume forecasting.

experience.description: Consulted on manufacturing line layouts for aluminum parts.
achievements: Reduced cycle time by 10% using Arena simulation models.
